title: Draft Weekly Client Update Email
description: An agent must draft a weekly status update email for a client based on a list of completed tasks and upcoming activities.

tasks.description: Receive a list of tasks completed this week and tasks planned for next week.
Draft a professional email with three sections: 'Progress This Week', 'Plan for Next Week', and 'Risks & Issues'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a well-structured and professionally toned email.

tasks.description: Ensure the email has a clear subject line (e.g., 'Project Phoenix - Weekly Status Update - July 12, 2025').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a correctly formatted subject line.
